summary: Donation website for ocean conservation and marine life protection, featuring information about sea animals and a donation system
architectural_notes: Website focused on marine conservation and ocean life protection
Donation processing system required for accepting contributions
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner featuring underwater ocean scene with diverse marine life including fish, sea turtles, and coral reefs in vibrant blues and greens (hero-ocean.dim_1920x600.png)
- Illustration of sea turtle swimming in ocean waters (sea-turtle.dim_800x600.png)
- Illustration of colorful coral reef ecosystem with tropical fish (coral-reef.dim_800x600.png)
- Illustration of dolphin pod in open ocean (dolphins.dim_800x600.png)
- Illustration of whale swimming in deep ocean (whale.dim_800x600.png)
- Ocean conservation icon with wave and fish symbol (conservation-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that introduces the mission of protecting marine life and sea animals, with compelling visuals and messaging about ocean conservation
Build an information section that educates visitors about threats to marine life, endangered sea animals, and the importance of ocean ecosystems
Implement a donation form where users can select donation amounts and contribute to ocean conservation efforts
Display a showcase of sea animals and marine species that benefit from conservation donations, with images and descriptions
Integrate donation form with backend to submit and confirm donation transactions

Apply a cohesive ocean-themed visual design throughout the website with marine-inspired colors (ocean blues, teals, aqua greens), fluid typography, and wave-like design elements that evoke underwater environments and marine conservation
Render generated ocean and marine life images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory

new_feature_requests.summary: Donation system for marine life protection
Showcase sea animals and conservation causes
Create backend actor methods to record donation information including donor details and donation amounts for marine life conservation
